entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023
